text: The 1950 Santa Clara Broncos football team was an American football team that represented Santa Clara University during the 1950 college football season. In their first season under head coach Richard F. Gallagher, the Broncos compiled a 3–7 record and were outscored by opponents by a combined total of 198 to 165. ==Schedule== ==References== Santa Clara Category:Santa Clara Broncos football seasons Santa Clara Broncos football
title: 1950 Santa Clara Broncos football team
